  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>17012421-8962-4df9-a0b5-f57ca2cf4dbb#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A virágos növények anyagcseréje</string>
            <string language="en">Metabolism of flowering plants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metabolismus der blühender Pflanzen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Métabolisme des usines fleurissantes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Metabolism de plantas flowering</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metabolismo delle piante flowering</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταβολισμός των ανθίζοντας φυτών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Metabolismo de plantas florecientes</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A hajtásos növények vízfelvétele, vízszállítása és nappali gázcseréje</string>
            <string language="en">Absorption of water, transport of water and gas-replacement of the day by offshoot plants</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">növényi anyagcsere,  vízfelvétel,  hajtásos növények,  </string>
            <string language="en">plant-metabolism, absorption of water, offshoot plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Absorption des Wassers, Transport des Wassers und 
Gas-Wiedereinbau des Tages durch Abzweigung Betriebe</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Absorption de l'eau, transport de l'eau et 
gaz-remplacement du jour par des usines de ramification</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Absorption da água, transporte da água e 
gás-recolocação do dia por plantas do ramo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Assorbimento di acqua, trasporto di acqua e 
gas-rimontaggio del giorno dalle piante del ramo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απορρόφηση του ύδατος, μεταφορά του ύδατος και 
αέριο της ημέρας από τις εγκαταστάσεις παραφυάδων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Absorción del agua, transporte del agua y 
gas-reemplazo del día por las plantas del vástago</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betrieb-Metabolismus, Absorption des Wassers, Abzweigung
Betriebe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">usine-métabolisme, absorption de l'eau, usines de 
ramification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta-plant-metabolism, absorption da água, plantas do
ramo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pianta-metabolismo, assorbimento di acqua, piante del 
ramo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εγκατάσταση-μεταβολισμός, απορρόφηση του ύδατος, 
εγκαταστάσεις παραφυάδων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">planta-metabolismo, absorción del agua, plantas del 
vástago</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

    </metadata>
